sentences.en: a corrupt society
sentences.cn: 堕落的社会

sentences.en: Corrupt judges have taken millions of dollars in bribes.
sentences.cn: 腐败的法官接受了几百万美元的贿赂。

sentences.en: Corrupt practices include bribery, treating.
sentences.cn: 舞弊行为包括受贿, 请客拉拢.

sentences.en: Either your key database is corrupt or has been deleted.
sentences.cn: 可能是密钥数据库被破坏或已经被删除.

sentences.en: He had accused three opposition members of corrupt practices.
sentences.cn: 他指控3名反对派成员营私舞弊。

sentences.en: He was neither arrogant nor corrupt.
sentences.cn: 他既不自高自大,也不腐化堕落.

sentences.en: I'll disclose every little corrupt thing you've done to the world.
sentences.cn: 我会把你所有的丑事都抖搂出来.

sentences.en: It is sad to see a man so corrupted by the desire for money and power.
sentences.cn: 看到一个人被金钱和权力欲望所腐蚀很可悲。

sentences.en: Power tends to corrupt.
sentences.cn: 权力容易造成腐化。

sentences.en: The black market was flourishing, everybody was corrupt, in it up to their necks.
sentences.cn: 黑市繁荣，每个人都已堕落，深陷其中。

sentences.en: The manuscript is so corrupt that parts of it make no sense at all.
sentences.cn: 这稿子由于讹误太多,以致有的部分意义不明.

sentences.en: The newly emerging forces are bound to defeat what is corrupt and degenerate.
sentences.cn: 新生力量必然战胜腐朽力量.

sentences.en: The newspaper alleged the mayor's corrupt practices.
sentences.cn: 那家报纸断言市长有舞弊行为.

sentences.en: The official led a corrupt life.
sentences.cn: 这个官员过着堕落的生活.

sentences.en: They left the bodies to corrupt on the field.
sentences.cn: 他们让尸体在战场上腐烂.

sentences.en: They pretend to be guarding the public's morals, and they corrupt them with their beastly reports.
sentences.cn: 他们装作保卫公众道德, 但是他们的下流报道只能使公众道德堕落.

sentences.en: This young man was influenced by bad people and became corrupt without being aware of it.
sentences.cn: 这个青年受坏人引诱,开始堕落而不自觉.

sentences.en: We can't dance to the tune of corrupt politicians and capitalists!
sentences.cn: 我们不能再对那些腐化堕落的政客和财阀们唯命是从了!

sentences.en: Who corrupt and subvert the very principles our constitution exists to uphold.
sentences.cn: 我们宪法所维护的准则被这些人腐化和破坏.

sentences.en: Young prisoners are being corrupted by the older, long-term offenders.
sentences.cn: 年轻的囚犯正在被年纪较大、刑期长的犯人带坏。

words.tran_cn: 易腐败的；易堕落的；可以贿赂的
使堕落的；腐败性的；使腐坏的
堕落性；腐败性；易腐败的倾向

trans.tran_cn: 腐败的，贪污的，不诚实的，〈计〉有错误的
trans.tran_en: using your power in a dishonest or illegal way in order to get an advantage for yourself
to encourage someone to start behaving in an immoral or dishonest way
to encourage someone to start behaving in an immoral or dishonest way
